8161 `e^{ax} (\vec{w_1} \sin(bx) + \vec{w_2} \cos(bx))` 

8162 

8163 3. If some eigenvalues are repeated. Then we get fewer than `n` linearly 

8164 independent eigenvectors, we miss some of the solutions and need to 

8165 construct the missing ones. We do this via generalized eigenvectors, vectors 

8166 which are not eigenvectors but are close enough that we can use to write 

8167 down the remaining solutions. For a eigenvalue `r` with eigenvector `\vec{w}` 

8168 we obtain `\vec{w_2},...,\vec{w_k}` using 

8169 

8170 .. math:: (A - r I) . \vec{w_2} = \vec{w} 

8171 

8172 .. math:: (A - r I) . \vec{w_3} = \vec{w_2} 

8173 

8174 .. math:: \vdots 

8175 

8176 .. math:: (A - r I) . \vec{w_k} = \vec{w_{k-1}} 

8177 

8178 Then the solutions to the system for the eigenspace are `e^{rt} [\vec{w}], 

8179 e^{rt} [t \vec{w} + \vec{w_2}], e^{rt} [\frac{t^2}{2} \vec{w} + t \vec{w_2} + \vec{w_3}], 

8180 ...,e^{rt} [\frac{t^{k-1}}{(k-1)!} \vec{w} + \frac{t^{k-2}}{(k-2)!} \vec{w_2} +...+ t \vec{w_{k-1}} 

8181 + \vec{w_k}]` 

8182 

8183 So, If `\vec{y_1},...,\vec{y_n}` are `n` solution of obtained from three 

8184 categories of `A`, then general solution to the system `\vec{y'} = A . \vec{y}` 

8185 

8186 .. math:: \vec{y} = C_1 \vec{y_1} + C_2 \vec{y_2} + \cdots + C_n \vec{y_n} 

8187 

8188 """ 

8189 eq = match_['eq'] 

8190 func = match_['func'] 

8191 fc = match_['func_coeff'] 

8192 n = len(eq) 

8193 t = list(list(eq[0].atoms(Derivative))[0].atoms(Symbol))[0] 

8194 constants = numbered_symbols(prefix='C', cls=Symbol, start=1) 

8195 M = Matrix(n,n,lambda i,j:-fc[i,func[j],0]) 

8196 evector = M.eigenvects(simplify=True) 

8197 def is_complex(mat, root): 

8198 return Matrix(n, 1, lambda i,j: re(mat[i])*cos(im(root)*t) - im(mat[i])*sin(im(root)*t)) 

8199 def is_complex_conjugate(mat, root): 

8200 return Matrix(n, 1, lambda i,j: re(mat[i])*sin(abs(im(root))*t) + im(mat[i])*cos(im(root)*t)*abs(im(root))/im(root)) 

8201 conjugate_root = [] 

8202 e_vector = zeros(n,1) 

8203 for evects in evector: 

8204 if evects[0] not in conjugate_root: 

8205 # If number of column of an eigenvector is not equal to the multiplicity 

8206 # of its eigenvalue then the legt eigenvectors are calculated 

8207 if len(evects[2])!=evects[1]: 

8208 var_mat = Matrix(n, 1, lambda i,j: Symbol('x'+str(i))) 

8209 Mnew = (M - evects[0]*eye(evects[2][-1].rows))*var_mat 

8210 w = [0 for i in range(evects[1])] 

8211 w[0] = evects[2][-1] 

8212 for r in range(1, evects[1]): 

8213 w_ = Mnew - w[r-1] 

8214 sol_dict = solve(list(w_), var_mat[1:]) 

8215 sol_dict[var_mat[0]] = var_mat[0] 

8216 for key, value in sol_dict.items(): 

8217 sol_dict[key] = value.subs(var_mat[0],1) 

8218 w[r] = Matrix(n, 1, lambda i,j: sol_dict[var_mat[i]]) 

8219 evects[2].append(w[r]) 

8220 for i in range(evects[1]): 

8221 C = next(constants) 

8222 for j in range(i+1): 

8223 if evects[0].has(I): 

8224 evects[2][j] = simplify(evects[2][j]) 

8225 e_vector += C*is_complex(evects[2][j], evects[0])*t**(i-j)*exp(re(evects[0])*t)/factorial(i-j) 

8226 C = next(constants) 

8227 e_vector += C*is_complex_conjugate(evects[2][j], evects[0])*t**(i-j)*exp(re(evects[0])*t)/factorial(i-j) 

8228 else: 

8229 e_vector += C*evects[2][j]*t**(i-j)*exp(evects[0]*t)/factorial(i-j) 

8230 if evects[0].has(I): 

8231 conjugate_root.append(conjugate(evects[0])) 

8232 sol = [] 

8233 for i in range(len(eq)): 

8234 sol.append(Eq(func[i],e_vector[i])) 

8235 return sol 

8236 

8237def sysode_nonlinear_2eq_order1(match_): 

8238 func = match_['func'] 

8239 eq = match_['eq'] 

8240 fc = match_['func_coeff'] 

8241 t = list(list(eq[0].atoms(Derivative))[0].atoms(Symbol))[0] 

8242 if match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type5': 

8243 sol = _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type5(func, t, eq) 

8244 return sol 

8245 x = func[0].func 

8246 y = func[1].func 

8247 for i in range(2): 

8248 eqs = 0 

8249 for terms in Add.make_args(eq[i]): 

8250 eqs += terms/fc[i,func[i],1] 

8251 eq[i] = eqs 

8252 if match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type1': 

8253 sol = _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type1(x, y, t, eq) 

8254 elif match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type2': 

8255 sol = _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type2(x, y, t, eq) 

8256 elif match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type3': 

8257 sol = _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type3(x, y, t, eq) 

8258 elif match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type4': 

8259 sol = _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type4(x, y, t, eq) 

8260 return sol 

8261 

8262def _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type1(x, y, t, eq): 

8263 r""" 

8264 Equations: 

8265 

8266 .. math:: x' = x^n F(x,y) 

8267 

8268 .. math:: y' = g(y) F(x,y) 

8269 

8270 Solution: 

8271 

8272 .. math:: x = \varphi(y), \int \frac{1}{g(y) F(\varphi(y),y)} \,dy = t + C_2 

8273 

8274 where 

8275 

8276 if `n \neq 1` 

8277 

8278 .. math:: \varphi = [C_1 + (1-n) \int \frac{1}{g(y)} \,dy]^{\frac{1}{1-n}} 

8279 

8280 if `n = 1` 

8281 

8282 .. math:: \varphi = C_1 e^{\int \frac{1}{g(y)} \,dy} 

8283 

8284 where `C_1` and `C_2` are arbitrary constants. 

8285 

8286 """ 

8287 C1, C2 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=2) 

8288 n = Wild('n', exclude=[x(t),y(t)]) 

8289 f = Wild('f') 

8290 u, v = symbols('u, v') 

8291 r = eq[0].match(diff(x(t),t) - x(t)**n*f) 

8292 g = ((diff(y(t),t) - eq[1])/r[f]).subs(y(t),v) 

8293 F = r[f].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v) 

8294 n = r[n] 

8295 if n!=1: 

8296 phi = (C1 + (1-n)*Integral(1/g, v))**(1/(1-n)) 

8297 else: 

8298 phi = C1*exp(Integral(1/g, v)) 

8299 phi = phi.doit() 

8300 sol2 = solve(Integral(1/(g*F.subs(u,phi)), v).doit() - t - C2, v) 

8301 sol = [] 

8302 for sols in sol2: 

8303 sol.append(Eq(x(t),phi.subs(v, sols))) 

8304 sol.append(Eq(y(t), sols)) 

8305 return sol 

8306 

8307def _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type2(x, y, t, eq): 

8308 r""" 

8309 Equations: 

8310 

8311 .. math:: x' = e^{\lambda x} F(x,y) 

8312 

8313 .. math:: y' = g(y) F(x,y) 

8314 

8315 Solution: 

8316 

8317 .. math:: x = \varphi(y), \int \frac{1}{g(y) F(\varphi(y),y)} \,dy = t + C_2 

8318 

8319 where 

8320 

8321 if `\lambda \neq 0` 

8322 

8323 .. math:: \varphi = -\frac{1}{\lambda} log(C_1 - \lambda \int \frac{1}{g(y)} \,dy) 

8324 

8325 if `\lambda = 0` 

8326 

8327 .. math:: \varphi = C_1 + \int \frac{1}{g(y)} \,dy 

8328 

8329 where `C_1` and `C_2` are arbitrary constants. 

8330 

8331 """ 

8332 C1, C2 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=2) 

8333 n = Wild('n', exclude=[x(t),y(t)]) 

8334 f = Wild('f') 

8335 u, v = symbols('u, v') 

8336 r = eq[0].match(diff(x(t),t) - exp(n*x(t))*f) 

8337 g = ((diff(y(t),t) - eq[1])/r[f]).subs(y(t),v) 

8338 F = r[f].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v) 

8339 n = r[n] 

8340 if n: 

8341 phi = -1/n*log(C1 - n*Integral(1/g, v)) 

8342 else: 

8343 phi = C1 + Integral(1/g, v) 

8344 phi = phi.doit() 

8345 sol2 = solve(Integral(1/(g*F.subs(u,phi)), v).doit() - t - C2, v) 

8346 sol = [] 

8347 for sols in sol2: 

8348 sol.append(Eq(x(t),phi.subs(v, sols))) 

8349 sol.append(Eq(y(t), sols)) 

8350 return sol 

8351 

8352def _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type3(x, y, t, eq): 

8353 r""" 

8354 Autonomous system of general form 

8355 

8356 .. math:: x' = F(x,y) 

8357 

8358 .. math:: y' = G(x,y) 

8359 

8360 Assuming `y = y(x, C_1)` where `C_1` is an arbitrary constant is the general 

8361 solution of the first-order equation 

8362 

8363 .. math:: F(x,y) y'_x = G(x,y) 

8364 

8365 Then the general solution of the original system of equations has the form 

8366 

8367 .. math:: \int \frac{1}{F(x,y(x,C_1))} \,dx = t + C_1 

8368 

8369 """ 

8370 C1, C2, C3, C4 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=4) 

8371 v = Function('v') 

8372 u = Symbol('u') 

8373 f = Wild('f') 

8374 g = Wild('g') 

8375 r1 = eq[0].match(diff(x(t),t) - f) 

8376 r2 = eq[1].match(diff(y(t),t) - g) 

8377 F = r1[f].subs(x(t), u).subs(y(t), v(u)) 

8378 G = r2[g].subs(x(t), u).subs(y(t), v(u)) 

8379 sol2r = dsolve(Eq(diff(v(u), u), G/F)) 

8380 for sol2s in sol2r: 

8381 sol1 = solve(Integral(1/F.subs(v(u), sol2s.rhs), u).doit() - t - C2, u) 

8382 sol = [] 

8383 for sols in sol1: 

8384 sol.append(Eq(x(t), sols)) 

8385 sol.append(Eq(y(t), (sol2s.rhs).subs(u, sols))) 

8386 return sol 

8387 

8388def _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type4(x, y, t, eq): 

8389 r""" 

8390 Equation: 

8391 

8392 .. math:: x' = f_1(x) g_1(y) \phi(x,y,t) 

8393 

8394 .. math:: y' = f_2(x) g_2(y) \phi(x,y,t) 

8395 

8396 First integral: 

8397 

8398 .. math:: \int \frac{f_2(x)}{f_1(x)} \,dx - \int \frac{g_1(y)}{g_2(y)} \,dy = C 

8399 

8400 where `C` is an arbitrary constant. 

8401 

8402 On solving the first integral for `x` (resp., `y` ) and on substituting the 

8403 resulting expression into either equation of the original solution, one 

8404 arrives at a first-order equation for determining `y` (resp., `x` ). 

8405 

8406 """ 

8407 C1, C2 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=2) 

8408 u, v = symbols('u, v') 

8409 U, V = symbols('U, V', cls=Function) 

8410 f = Wild('f') 

8411 g = Wild('g') 

8412 f1 = Wild('f1', exclude=[v,t]) 

8413 f2 = Wild('f2', exclude=[v,t]) 

8414 g1 = Wild('g1', exclude=[u,t]) 

8415 g2 = Wild('g2', exclude=[u,t]) 

8416 r1 = eq[0].match(diff(x(t),t) - f) 

8417 r2 = eq[1].match(diff(y(t),t) - g) 

8418 num, den = ( 

8419 (r1[f].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v))/ 

8420 (r2[g].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v))).as_numer_denom() 

8421 R1 = num.match(f1*g1) 

8422 R2 = den.match(f2*g2) 

8423 phi = (r1[f].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v))/num 

8424 F1 = R1[f1]; F2 = R2[f2] 

8425 G1 = R1[g1]; G2 = R2[g2] 

8426 sol1r = solve(Integral(F2/F1, u).doit() - Integral(G1/G2,v).doit() - C1, u) 

8427 sol2r = solve(Integral(F2/F1, u).doit() - Integral(G1/G2,v).doit() - C1, v) 

8428 sol = [] 

8429 for sols in sol1r: 

8430 sol.append(Eq(y(t), dsolve(diff(V(t),t) - F2.subs(u,sols).subs(v,V(t))*G2.subs(v,V(t))*phi.subs(u,sols).subs(v,V(t))).rhs)) 

8431 for sols in sol2r: 

8432 sol.append(Eq(x(t), dsolve(diff(U(t),t) - F1.subs(u,U(t))*G1.subs(v,sols).subs(u,U(t))*phi.subs(v,sols).subs(u,U(t))).rhs)) 

8433 return set(sol) 

8434 

8435def _nonlinear_2eq_order1_type5(func, t, eq): 

8436 r""" 

8437 Clairaut system of ODEs 

8438 

8439 .. math:: x = t x' + F(x',y') 

8440 

8441 .. math:: y = t y' + G(x',y') 

8442 

8443 The following are solutions of the system 

8444 

8445 `(i)` straight lines: 

8446 

8447 .. math:: x = C_1 t + F(C_1, C_2), y = C_2 t + G(C_1, C_2) 

8448 

8449 where `C_1` and `C_2` are arbitrary constants; 

8450 

8451 `(ii)` envelopes of the above lines; 

8452 

8453 `(iii)` continuously differentiable lines made up from segments of the lines 

8454 `(i)` and `(ii)`. 

8455 

8456 """ 

8457 C1, C2 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=2) 

8458 f = Wild('f') 

8459 g = Wild('g') 

8460 def check_type(x, y): 

8461 r1 = eq[0].match(t*diff(x(t),t) - x(t) + f) 

8462 r2 = eq[1].match(t*diff(y(t),t) - y(t) + g) 

8463 if not (r1 and r2): 

8464 r1 = eq[0].match(diff(x(t),t) - x(t)/t + f/t) 

8465 r2 = eq[1].match(diff(y(t),t) - y(t)/t + g/t) 

8466 if not (r1 and r2): 

8467 r1 = (-eq[0]).match(t*diff(x(t),t) - x(t) + f) 

8468 r2 = (-eq[1]).match(t*diff(y(t),t) - y(t) + g) 

8469 if not (r1 and r2): 

8470 r1 = (-eq[0]).match(diff(x(t),t) - x(t)/t + f/t) 

8471 r2 = (-eq[1]).match(diff(y(t),t) - y(t)/t + g/t) 

8472 return [r1, r2] 

8473 for func_ in func: 

8474 if isinstance(func_, list): 

8475 x = func[0][0].func 

8476 y = func[0][1].func 

8477 [r1, r2] = check_type(x, y) 

8478 if not (r1 and r2): 

8479 [r1, r2] = check_type(y, x) 

8480 x, y = y, x 

8481 x1 = diff(x(t),t); y1 = diff(y(t),t) 

8482 return {Eq(x(t), C1*t + r1[f].subs(x1,C1).subs(y1,C2)), Eq(y(t), C2*t + r2[g].subs(x1,C1).subs(y1,C2))} 

8483 

8484def sysode_nonlinear_3eq_order1(match_): 

8485 x = match_['func'][0].func 

8486 y = match_['func'][1].func 

8487 z = match_['func'][2].func 

8488 eq = match_['eq'] 

8489 fc = match_['func_coeff'] 

8490 func = match_['func'] 

8491 t = list(list(eq[0].atoms(Derivative))[0].atoms(Symbol))[0] 

8492 if match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type1': 

8493 sol = _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type1(x, y, z, t, eq) 

8494 if match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type2': 

8495 sol = _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type2(x, y, z, t, eq) 

8496 if match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type3': 

8497 sol = _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type3(x, y, z, t, eq) 

8498 if match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type4': 

8499 sol = _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type4(x, y, z, t, eq) 

8500 if match_['type_of_equation'] == 'type5': 

8501 sol = _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type5(x, y, z, t, eq) 

8502 return sol 

8503 

8504def _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type1(x, y, z, t, eq): 

8505 r""" 

8506 Equations: 

8507 

8508 .. math:: a x' = (b - c) y z, \enspace b y' = (c - a) z x, \enspace c z' = (a - b) x y 

8509 

8510 First Integrals: 

8511 

8512 .. math:: a x^{2} + b y^{2} + c z^{2} = C_1 

8513 

8514 .. math:: a^{2} x^{2} + b^{2} y^{2} + c^{2} z^{2} = C_2 

8515 

8516 where `C_1` and `C_2` are arbitrary constants. On solving the integrals for `y` and 

8517 `z` and on substituting the resulting expressions into the first equation of the 

8518 system, we arrives at a separable first-order equation on `x`. Similarly doing that 

8519 for other two equations, we will arrive at first order equation on `y` and `z` too. 

8520 

8521 References 

8522 ========== 

8523 -http://eqworld.ipmnet.ru/en/solutions/sysode/sode0401.pdf 

8524 

8525 """ 

8526 C1, C2 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=2) 

8527 u, v, w = symbols('u, v, w') 

8528 p = Wild('p', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8529 q = Wild('q', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8530 s = Wild('s', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8531 r = (diff(x(t),t) - eq[0]).match(p*y(t)*z(t)) 

8532 r.update((diff(y(t),t) - eq[1]).match(q*z(t)*x(t))) 

8533 r.update((diff(z(t),t) - eq[2]).match(s*x(t)*y(t))) 

8534 n1, d1 = r[p].as_numer_denom() 

8535 n2, d2 = r[q].as_numer_denom() 

8536 n3, d3 = r[s].as_numer_denom() 

8537 val = solve([n1*u-d1*v+d1*w, d2*u+n2*v-d2*w, d3*u-d3*v-n3*w],[u,v]) 

8538 vals = [val[v], val[u]] 

8539 c = lcm(vals[0].as_numer_denom()[1], vals[1].as_numer_denom()[1]) 

8540 b = vals[0].subs(w,c) 

8541 a = vals[1].subs(w,c) 

8542 y_x = sqrt(((c*C1-C2) - a*(c-a)*x(t)**2)/(b*(c-b))) 

8543 z_x = sqrt(((b*C1-C2) - a*(b-a)*x(t)**2)/(c*(b-c))) 

8544 z_y = sqrt(((a*C1-C2) - b*(a-b)*y(t)**2)/(c*(a-c))) 

8545 x_y = sqrt(((c*C1-C2) - b*(c-b)*y(t)**2)/(a*(c-a))) 

8546 x_z = sqrt(((b*C1-C2) - c*(b-c)*z(t)**2)/(a*(b-a))) 

8547 y_z = sqrt(((a*C1-C2) - c*(a-c)*z(t)**2)/(b*(a-b))) 

8548 sol1 = dsolve(a*diff(x(t),t) - (b-c)*y_x*z_x) 

8549 sol2 = dsolve(b*diff(y(t),t) - (c-a)*z_y*x_y) 

8550 sol3 = dsolve(c*diff(z(t),t) - (a-b)*x_z*y_z) 

8551 return [sol1, sol2, sol3] 

8552 

8553 

8554def _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type2(x, y, z, t, eq): 

8555 r""" 

8556 Equations: 

8557 

8558 .. math:: a x' = (b - c) y z f(x, y, z, t) 

8559 

8560 .. math:: b y' = (c - a) z x f(x, y, z, t) 

8561 

8562 .. math:: c z' = (a - b) x y f(x, y, z, t) 

8563 

8564 First Integrals: 

8565 

8566 .. math:: a x^{2} + b y^{2} + c z^{2} = C_1 

8567 

8568 .. math:: a^{2} x^{2} + b^{2} y^{2} + c^{2} z^{2} = C_2 

8569 

8570 where `C_1` and `C_2` are arbitrary constants. On solving the integrals for `y` and 

8571 `z` and on substituting the resulting expressions into the first equation of the 

8572 system, we arrives at a first-order differential equations on `x`. Similarly doing 

8573 that for other two equations we will arrive at first order equation on `y` and `z`. 

8574 

8575 References 

8576 ========== 

8577 -http://eqworld.ipmnet.ru/en/solutions/sysode/sode0402.pdf 

8578 

8579 """ 

8580 C1, C2 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=2) 

8581 u, v, w = symbols('u, v, w') 

8582 p = Wild('p', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8583 q = Wild('q', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8584 s = Wild('s', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8585 f = Wild('f') 

8586 r1 = (diff(x(t),t) - eq[0]).match(y(t)*z(t)*f) 

8587 r = collect_const(r1[f]).match(p*f) 

8588 r.update(((diff(y(t),t) - eq[1])/r[f]).match(q*z(t)*x(t))) 

8589 r.update(((diff(z(t),t) - eq[2])/r[f]).match(s*x(t)*y(t))) 

8590 n1, d1 = r[p].as_numer_denom() 

8591 n2, d2 = r[q].as_numer_denom() 

8592 n3, d3 = r[s].as_numer_denom() 

8593 val = solve([n1*u-d1*v+d1*w, d2*u+n2*v-d2*w, -d3*u+d3*v+n3*w],[u,v]) 

8594 vals = [val[v], val[u]] 

8595 c = lcm(vals[0].as_numer_denom()[1], vals[1].as_numer_denom()[1]) 

8596 a = vals[0].subs(w,c) 

8597 b = vals[1].subs(w,c) 

8598 y_x = sqrt(((c*C1-C2) - a*(c-a)*x(t)**2)/(b*(c-b))) 

8599 z_x = sqrt(((b*C1-C2) - a*(b-a)*x(t)**2)/(c*(b-c))) 

8600 z_y = sqrt(((a*C1-C2) - b*(a-b)*y(t)**2)/(c*(a-c))) 

8601 x_y = sqrt(((c*C1-C2) - b*(c-b)*y(t)**2)/(a*(c-a))) 

8602 x_z = sqrt(((b*C1-C2) - c*(b-c)*z(t)**2)/(a*(b-a))) 

8603 y_z = sqrt(((a*C1-C2) - c*(a-c)*z(t)**2)/(b*(a-b))) 

8604 sol1 = dsolve(a*diff(x(t),t) - (b-c)*y_x*z_x*r[f]) 

8605 sol2 = dsolve(b*diff(y(t),t) - (c-a)*z_y*x_y*r[f]) 

8606 sol3 = dsolve(c*diff(z(t),t) - (a-b)*x_z*y_z*r[f]) 

8607 return [sol1, sol2, sol3] 

8608 

8609def _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type3(x, y, z, t, eq): 

8610 r""" 

8611 Equations: 

8612 

8613 .. math:: x' = c F_2 - b F_3, \enspace y' = a F_3 - c F_1, \enspace z' = b F_1 - a F_2 

8614 

8615 where `F_n = F_n(x, y, z, t)`. 

8616 

8617 1. First Integral: 

8618 

8619 .. math:: a x + b y + c z = C_1, 

8620 

8621 where C is an arbitrary constant. 

8622 

8623 2. If we assume function `F_n` to be independent of `t`,i.e, `F_n` = `F_n (x, y, z)` 

8624 Then, on eliminating `t` and `z` from the first two equation of the system, one 

8625 arrives at the first-order equation 

8626 

8627 .. math:: \frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{a F_3 (x, y, z) - c F_1 (x, y, z)}{c F_2 (x, y, z) - 

8628 b F_3 (x, y, z)} 

8629 

8630 where `z = \frac{1}{c} (C_1 - a x - b y)` 

8631 

8632 References 

8633 ========== 

8634 -http://eqworld.ipmnet.ru/en/solutions/sysode/sode0404.pdf 

8635 

8636 """ 

8637 C1 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=1) 

8638 u, v, w = symbols('u, v, w') 

8639 p = Wild('p', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8640 q = Wild('q', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8641 s = Wild('s', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8642 F1, F2, F3 = symbols('F1, F2, F3', cls=Wild) 

8643 r1 = (diff(x(t),t) - eq[0]).match(F2-F3) 

8644 r = collect_const(r1[F2]).match(s*F2) 

8645 r.update(collect_const(r1[F3]).match(q*F3)) 

8646 if eq[1].has(r[F2]) and not eq[1].has(r[F3]): 

8647 r[F2], r[F3] = r[F3], r[F2] 

8648 r[s], r[q] = -r[q], -r[s] 

8649 r.update((diff(y(t),t) - eq[1]).match(p*r[F3] - r[s]*F1)) 

8650 a = r[p]; b = r[q]; c = r[s] 

8651 F1 = r[F1].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8652 F2 = r[F2].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8653 F3 = r[F3].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8654 z_xy = (C1-a*u-b*v)/c 

8655 y_zx = (C1-a*u-c*w)/b 

8656 x_yz = (C1-b*v-c*w)/a 

8657 y_x = dsolve(diff(v(u),u) - ((a*F3-c*F1)/(c*F2-b*F3)).subs(w,z_xy).subs(v,v(u))).rhs 

8658 z_x = dsolve(diff(w(u),u) - ((b*F1-a*F2)/(c*F2-b*F3)).subs(v,y_zx).subs(w,w(u))).rhs 

8659 z_y = dsolve(diff(w(v),v) - ((b*F1-a*F2)/(a*F3-c*F1)).subs(u,x_yz).subs(w,w(v))).rhs 

8660 x_y = dsolve(diff(u(v),v) - ((c*F2-b*F3)/(a*F3-c*F1)).subs(w,z_xy).subs(u,u(v))).rhs 

8661 y_z = dsolve(diff(v(w),w) - ((a*F3-c*F1)/(b*F1-a*F2)).subs(u,x_yz).subs(v,v(w))).rhs 

8662 x_z = dsolve(diff(u(w),w) - ((c*F2-b*F3)/(b*F1-a*F2)).subs(v,y_zx).subs(u,u(w))).rhs 

8663 sol1 = dsolve(diff(u(t),t) - (c*F2 - b*F3).subs(v,y_x).subs(w,z_x).subs(u,u(t))).rhs 

8664 sol2 = dsolve(diff(v(t),t) - (a*F3 - c*F1).subs(u,x_y).subs(w,z_y).subs(v,v(t))).rhs 

8665 sol3 = dsolve(diff(w(t),t) - (b*F1 - a*F2).subs(u,x_z).subs(v,y_z).subs(w,w(t))).rhs 

8666 return [sol1, sol2, sol3] 

8667 

8668def _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type4(x, y, z, t, eq): 

8669 r""" 

8670 Equations: 

8671 

8672 .. math:: x' = c z F_2 - b y F_3, \enspace y' = a x F_3 - c z F_1, \enspace z' = b y F_1 - a x F_2 

8673 

8674 where `F_n = F_n (x, y, z, t)` 

8675 

8676 1. First integral: 

8677 

8678 .. math:: a x^{2} + b y^{2} + c z^{2} = C_1 

8679 

8680 where `C` is an arbitrary constant. 

8681 

8682 2. Assuming the function `F_n` is independent of `t`: `F_n = F_n (x, y, z)`. Then on 

8683 eliminating `t` and `z` from the first two equations of the system, one arrives at 

8684 the first-order equation 

8685 

8686 .. math:: \frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{a x F_3 (x, y, z) - c z F_1 (x, y, z)} 

8687 {c z F_2 (x, y, z) - b y F_3 (x, y, z)} 

8688 

8689 where `z = \pm \sqrt{\frac{1}{c} (C_1 - a x^{2} - b y^{2})}` 

8690 

8691 References 

8692 ========== 

8693 -http://eqworld.ipmnet.ru/en/solutions/sysode/sode0405.pdf 

8694 

8695 """ 

8696 C1 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=1) 

8697 u, v, w = symbols('u, v, w') 

8698 p = Wild('p', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8699 q = Wild('q', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8700 s = Wild('s', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8701 F1, F2, F3 = symbols('F1, F2, F3', cls=Wild) 

8702 r1 = eq[0].match(diff(x(t),t) - z(t)*F2 + y(t)*F3) 

8703 r = collect_const(r1[F2]).match(s*F2) 

8704 r.update(collect_const(r1[F3]).match(q*F3)) 

8705 if eq[1].has(r[F2]) and not eq[1].has(r[F3]): 

8706 r[F2], r[F3] = r[F3], r[F2] 

8707 r[s], r[q] = -r[q], -r[s] 

8708 r.update((diff(y(t),t) - eq[1]).match(p*x(t)*r[F3] - r[s]*z(t)*F1)) 

8709 a = r[p]; b = r[q]; c = r[s] 

8710 F1 = r[F1].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8711 F2 = r[F2].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8712 F3 = r[F3].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8713 x_yz = sqrt((C1 - b*v**2 - c*w**2)/a) 

8714 y_zx = sqrt((C1 - c*w**2 - a*u**2)/b) 

8715 z_xy = sqrt((C1 - a*u**2 - b*v**2)/c) 

8716 y_x = dsolve(diff(v(u),u) - ((a*u*F3-c*w*F1)/(c*w*F2-b*v*F3)).subs(w,z_xy).subs(v,v(u))).rhs 

8717 z_x = dsolve(diff(w(u),u) - ((b*v*F1-a*u*F2)/(c*w*F2-b*v*F3)).subs(v,y_zx).subs(w,w(u))).rhs 

8718 z_y = dsolve(diff(w(v),v) - ((b*v*F1-a*u*F2)/(a*u*F3-c*w*F1)).subs(u,x_yz).subs(w,w(v))).rhs 

8719 x_y = dsolve(diff(u(v),v) - ((c*w*F2-b*v*F3)/(a*u*F3-c*w*F1)).subs(w,z_xy).subs(u,u(v))).rhs 

8720 y_z = dsolve(diff(v(w),w) - ((a*u*F3-c*w*F1)/(b*v*F1-a*u*F2)).subs(u,x_yz).subs(v,v(w))).rhs 

8721 x_z = dsolve(diff(u(w),w) - ((c*w*F2-b*v*F3)/(b*v*F1-a*u*F2)).subs(v,y_zx).subs(u,u(w))).rhs 

8722 sol1 = dsolve(diff(u(t),t) - (c*w*F2 - b*v*F3).subs(v,y_x).subs(w,z_x).subs(u,u(t))).rhs 

8723 sol2 = dsolve(diff(v(t),t) - (a*u*F3 - c*w*F1).subs(u,x_y).subs(w,z_y).subs(v,v(t))).rhs 

8724 sol3 = dsolve(diff(w(t),t) - (b*v*F1 - a*u*F2).subs(u,x_z).subs(v,y_z).subs(w,w(t))).rhs 

8725 return [sol1, sol2, sol3] 

8726 

8727def _nonlinear_3eq_order1_type5(x, y, t, eq): 

8728 r""" 

8729 .. math:: x' = x (c F_2 - b F_3), \enspace y' = y (a F_3 - c F_1), \enspace z' = z (b F_1 - a F_2) 

8730 

8731 where `F_n = F_n (x, y, z, t)` and are arbitrary functions. 

8732 

8733 First Integral: 

8734 

8735 .. math:: \left|x\right|^{a} \left|y\right|^{b} \left|z\right|^{c} = C_1 

8736 

8737 where `C` is an arbitrary constant. If the function `F_n` is independent of `t`, 

8738 then, by eliminating `t` and `z` from the first two equations of the system, one 

8739 arrives at a first-order equation. 

8740 

8741 References 

8742 ========== 

8743 -http://eqworld.ipmnet.ru/en/solutions/sysode/sode0406.pdf 

8744 

8745 """ 

8746 C1 = get_numbered_constants(eq, num=1) 

8747 u, v, w = symbols('u, v, w') 

8748 p = Wild('p', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8749 q = Wild('q', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8750 s = Wild('s', exclude=[x(t), y(t), z(t), t]) 

8751 F1, F2, F3 = symbols('F1, F2, F3', cls=Wild) 

8752 r1 = eq[0].match(diff(x(t),t) - x(t)*(F2 - F3)) 

8753 r = collect_const(r1[F2]).match(s*F2) 

8754 r.update(collect_const(r1[F3]).match(q*F3)) 

8755 if eq[1].has(r[F2]) and not eq[1].has(r[F3]): 

8756 r[F2], r[F3] = r[F3], r[F2] 

8757 r[s], r[q] = -r[q], -r[s] 

8758 r.update((diff(y(t),t) - eq[1]).match(y(t)*(a*r[F3] - r[c]*F1))) 

8759 a = r[p]; b = r[q]; c = r[s] 

8760 F1 = r[F1].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8761 F2 = r[F2].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8762 F3 = r[F3].subs(x(t),u).subs(y(t),v).subs(z(t),w) 

8763 x_yz = (C1*v**-b*w**-c)**-a 

8764 y_zx = (C1*w**-c*u**-a)**-b 

8765 z_xy = (C1*u**-a*v**-b)**-c 

8766 y_x = dsolve(diff(v(u),u) - ((v*(a*F3-c*F1))/(u*(c*F2-b*F3))).subs(w,z_xy).subs(v,v(u))).rhs 

8767 z_x = dsolve(diff(w(u),u) - ((w*(b*F1-a*F2))/(u*(c*F2-b*F3))).subs(v,y_zx).subs(w,w(u))).rhs 

8768 z_y = dsolve(diff(w(v),v) - ((w*(b*F1-a*F2))/(v*(a*F3-c*F1))).subs(u,x_yz).subs(w,w(v))).rhs 

8769 x_y = dsolve(diff(u(v),v) - ((u*(c*F2-b*F3))/(v*(a*F3-c*F1))).subs(w,z_xy).subs(u,u(v))).rhs 

8770 y_z = dsolve(diff(v(w),w) - ((v*(a*F3-c*F1))/(w*(b*F1-a*F2))).subs(u,x_yz).subs(v,v(w))).rhs 

8771 x_z = dsolve(diff(u(w),w) - ((u*(c*F2-b*F3))/(w*(b*F1-a*F2))).subs(v,y_zx).subs(u,u(w))).rhs 

8772 sol1 = dsolve(diff(u(t),t) - (u*(c*F2-b*F3)).subs(v,y_x).subs(w,z_x).subs(u,u(t))).rhs 

8773 sol2 = dsolve(diff(v(t),t) - (v*(a*F3-c*F1)).subs(u,x_y).subs(w,z_y).subs(v,v(t))).rhs 

8774 sol3 = dsolve(diff(w(t),t) - (w*(b*F1-a*F2)).subs(u,x_z).subs(v,y_z).subs(w,w(t))).rhs 

8775 return [sol1, sol2, sol3] 

« index     coverage.py v5.0.1, created at 2020-01-05 12:02
